short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: A browser action to show the Bank of China`s currencies exchange rates in real time, with a popup showing the detail rates chart.
short.zh_CN: 监控中国银行外汇牌价，显示汇率走势图，条件提醒等。

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
If you have business in China or be a Chinese student studying abroad, you may ofen have money transfered by Bank of China. 

The Currency Exchange Rate here published by Bank of China is not the same one as you searching from web in real time. 

So, you get this tool to help you trace the rates at present.

It can:

    * Show you the selected type of rate in badge.
    * Popup with multiple currecies and charts.
    * Triggers with message and/or voice notice.
    * English or Chinese Option page.

Support currencies:

    GBP,HKD,USD,CHF,SGD,SEK,DKK,NOK,JPY,
    CAD,AUD,EUR,MOP,PHP,THB,NZD,KRW,RUB

Change log:
3.3.7 - rename to Back of China Exchange Rates from BOC Rates & bug fix
3.3.6 - updated service url
3.3.5 - bug fix
3.3.4 - appfog service unstable, added old data service back for backup
3.3.3 - faster, more stable
3.3.2 - fix badge text
